sentences.cn: 冷冻干燥技术在蔬菜加工上的应用

sentences.en: As this processing loop is not required, it is unhooked from the collaboration.
sentences.cn: 由于并不需要这个处理循环，所以将其从协作中去除。

sentences.en: But its most natural target is in automation of system scripting and text processing tasks.
sentences.cn: 但是它最自然的目标在于系统脚本的自动化和本文处理任务。

sentences.en: Can you guess what the extra processing is here?
sentences.cn: 您可以猜出这里的额外处理是什么吗？

sentences.en: Control of these emissions by adequate gas - cleaning processing is essential.
sentences.cn: 采取有效的气体净化方法以控制这些放散物是十分重要的.

sentences.en: Figure 12 - 16 is a schematic drawing that illustrates the processing steps.
sentences.cn: 图12-16是生产流程的示意图.

sentences.en: In cotton and wool processing, short length fibers may clog sewers.
sentences.cn: 在棉毛生产中, 短纤维可能堵塞下水管道.

sentences.en: In the case of cotton processing, opening is necessary preliminary to cleaning.
sentences.cn: 在纺棉的情况下, 开棉是除杂前必须的.

sentences.en: My job is to tan leather in the leather processing company .
sentences.cn: 我在这家皮革加工厂里鞣革。

sentences.en: NIH is processing grant applications according to the guidelines.
sentences.cn: 根据这个准则,NIH正在复印准许申请表.

sentences.en: One of the last food - processing activities to become industrialized was baking.
sentences.cn: 面包和糕饼的焙制,是最后被工业化了的食品之一.

sentences.en: Processing and storage also may alter plant vitamin content.
sentences.cn: 加工和贮藏也会改变作物中维生素的含量.

sentences.en: Tea processing requires both technique and artistry.
sentences.cn: 茶叶加工对工艺和技巧都有要求。

sentences.en: The Data Processing analysis is likely to prevail in the long run.
sentences.cn: 从长远角度看,"数据加工"案的分析很可能起主导作用.

sentences.en: The fabric is strong enough to withstand harsh processing.
sentences.cn: 这种织物非常结实，能经受粗加工。

sentences.en: The machine is capable of processing 500 mm square plates very uniformly.
sentences.cn: 这种机器可用来冲洗500毫米见方的底片,并得到很均匀的效果.

sentences.en: This is called the scouring train in wool processing.
sentences.cn: 这被称为羊毛加工中的洗涤系列.

sentences.en: We must develop farm produce processing industry to boost the county economy.
sentences.cn: 发展农产品加工业,壮大县域经济.

words.tran_cn: 加工；[自]处理；对…起诉（process的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 食品加工，食品处理；进食，食品热杀菌
信息处理；信息加工；情报整理
n. 炼油厂；石油加工厂
加工贸易；委托加工贸易

trans.tran_cn: （数据）处理，整理，配置，工艺（生产方法）设计
加工( process的现在分词 )，处理，审阅，审核
